Project No. 24803
Project: NEW BOILER BUILDING
Drawing Num.: S0.00
Drawing Desc.: GENERAL NOTES
Client: BARTEK INGREDIENTS
Location: 690 SOUTH SERVICE RD, STONEY CREEK, ON, L8E 5M5
Date: 11/09/2023
Rev: 0
Issued for Construction
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL NOTES
1. BEFORE STARTING A JOB, THE CONTRACTOR SHALL VERIFY ALL DIMENSIONS INDICATED ON THE DRAWINGS AND THOROUGHLY EXAMINE THE SITE CONDITIONS. ANY DISCREPANCIES SHALL BE REPORTED TO THE ENGINEER.
2. THESE DRAWINGS SHALL BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE CONTRACT DOCUMENTS.
3. IT IS THE CONTRACTOR'S RESPONSIBILITY TO VERIFY WITH ALL AUTHORITIES HAVING JURISDICTION THAT WORK IS THAT WHICH IS REQUIRED BY THE GOVERNING CODES AND REGULATIONS AS SET FORTH BY THE CONTRACT DOCUMENTS.
4. ALL REQUIREMENTS AND PROCEDURES SHALL FOLLOW THE LATEST CODES AND STANDARDS.
5. THESE DRAWINGS SHALL NOT BE SCALED.
6. FOLLOW CONSTRUCTION OF ALL WORK ON THIS PROJECT SHALL CONFORM TO THE LATEST EDITION OF THE NATIONAL BUILDING CODE.
7. NO CHANGES SHALL BE MADE WITHOUT THE ENGINEER'S APPROVAL.
8. CONTRACTOR SHALL BUILD ACCORDING TO THESE DRAWINGS AND SPECIFICATIONS.
9. IT IS THE CONTRACTOR'S RESPONSIBILITY TO VERIFY ALL DIMENSIONS ON SITE AND REPORT THEM TO THE ENGINEER.
10. WORK SHALL BE PERFORMED IN A MANNER TO AVOID DAMAGE TO EXISTING STRUCTURES, UTILITIES, AND OTHER COMPONENTS.
11. THE USE OF THE DRAWINGS FOR ANY PURPOSE OTHER THAN THAT FOR WHICH THEY WERE ISSUED IS PROHIBITED.
12. THE ENGINEER SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE CONSTRUCTION MEANS, METHODS, TECHNIQUES, SEQUENCES, OR PROCEDURES.
13. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL MAINTAIN THE SITE IN A CLEAN AND SAFE CONDITION AT ALL TIMES.
14. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ADEQUATE SAFETY MEASURES TO PROTECT WORKERS AND THE PUBLIC.
15. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE PROTECTION OF ALL EXISTING UTILITIES AND STRUCTURES.
16. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY TEMPORARY SUPPORTS AND BRACING.
17. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY TEMPORARY SERVICES AND FACILITIES.
18. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY TEMPORARY ACCESS AND EGRESS.
19. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY TEMPORARY LIGHTING AND POWER.
20. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY TEMPORARY WATER AND SANITATION.
